commit.message:
Disable -fcheck-pointer-bounds with sanitizers.

2017-03-09  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	PR target/65705
	PR target/69804
	* toplev.c (process_options): Disable -fcheck-pointer-bounds with
	sanitizers.
2017-03-09  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	PR target/65705
	PR target/69804
	* gcc.target/i386/pr71458.c: Update scanned pattern.

From-SVN: r245997
